title: watch my reply
body: I downloaded a reply from my match history , I have it in my Documents , it disappeared from my match history as I had played a few more matches , so u may consider it from a 22 matches , so it`s not that old , the question is .... How can I watch this reply ?

replies.body: I hate to say it, but replays last for as long as a patch and will expire when a new update is live.  Per the Replays guide, you can turn moments in your replays to highlights to view it anytime after.  I highly recommend doing this to preserve your replays!  Regarding notifications, you'll see the bubble icon on the top right of the boards change from 0 to 1!  I hope that helps!
